verses.name: Genesis 43:17
verses.text: And the man did as Joseph bade; and the man brought the men into Joseph’s house.

verses.name: Genesis 43:18
verses.text: And the men were afraid, because they were brought into Joseph’s house; and they said, Because of the money that was returned in our sacks at the first time are we brought in; that he may seek occasion against us, and fall upon us, and take us for bondmen, and our asses.

verses.name: Genesis 43:19
verses.text: And they came near to the steward of Joseph’s house, and they communed with him at the door of the house,
